app[content][about]:
Harold's Walk is back and now he's walking around in your PC!

Explore 3D worlds and discover all the secret objects in Harold's Walk. Master the use of your special abilities to reach new areas.

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Peek_2024-05-15_09-57.gif[/img]

Veteran Harold's Walk players will recognize all the classic stages from the original handheld version of the game on Nintendo 3ds, plus new challenges, improved controls, and better graphics.

With a large batch of original never-before-seen content Harold's Walk on PC is worth a second lap around the track.
app[content][short_description]:
Harold's Walk on Steam is a remaster of the original Harold's Walk game that debuted on the Nintendo 3ds in 2020.

Odd and unusual spaces comprise most of your journey as you venture through this surreal collectathon.
app[content][sysreqs][mac][min][processo: Intel Core 4 CPU or better (Can also run on apple silicon M1)
